items.value: %113% bestowed the Book of the Dead to %00@ who pored over its secrets, unlocking the power to wield Death Magic. Before long, he has transformed into a Necromancer. With his newfound power, he has founded the new Zirana Faction, claiming %04@ as their unholy capital.
